description._content: Image taken from: Title: "Twelve sketches of scenery & antiquities on the line of the Great North of Scotland Railway. By G. Reid ... With illustrative letterpress by W. F" Author: FERGUSON, William - of Kinmundy Contributor: REID, George - Sir, P.R.S.A Shelfmark: "British Library HMNTS 10370.ff.12." Page: 88 Place of Publishing: Edinburgh Date of Publishing: 1883 Publisher: D. Douglas Issuance: monographic Identifier: 001218986 Note: The colours, contrast and appearance of these illustrations are unlikely to be true to life. They are derived from scanned images that have been enhanced for machine interpretation and have been altered from their originals.
